A faithful history of the northern affairs of Ireland from the late K. James accession to the crown, to the siege of Londonderry : giving a true account of the occasions of the miscarriages there, and of the reasons why the gentry abandon'd those parts / by a person who bore a great share in those transactions. Person who bore a great share in those transactions.
40 p.
Printed and are to be sold by Randall Taylor ..., London : 1690.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
=======
